name: Fantasy Mosaics 6
description:
Experience this new installment of mosaics puzzles in rainbow colors! Enjoy new features include an improved map layout that shows your achievements along with puzzle images!

Join our penguin on a journey to explore a mysterious alien world and meet its inhabitants.
Following the tradition of exciting multi-color gameplay, this new collection of custom built puzzles will bring you hours of fun and discovery.


- New custom built puzzles in color also known as picross, hanjie, nonograms, griddlers, paint by numbers.

- Explore an alien world

- New improved map layout

- Puzzles based solely on logic
